text: Epithelioid sarcoma     Treatment of epithelioid sarcoma may include the following:               -  Surgery to remove the tumor when possible.      -  Chemotherapy before or after surgery.      -  Radiation therapy before or after surgery.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy (histone methyltransferase inhibitor).
